verbose_text: However, we found that iv heroin passively administered to awake, quietly resting rats at a low self administering dose (0.1 mg/kg) induces moderate increases in NAc and muscle temperatures that were comparable in magnitude but longer in duration than those induced by iv cocaine [228].
evidence: iv heroin passively administered to awake, quietly resting rats at a low self-administering dose (0.1 mg/kg) induces moderate increases in NAc
